name: news-globe
description: Spinny 3D globe for the front page of HKI.com.
author: James Harris

scripts.build-en: uglifyjs src/vendor/two.js src/vendor/three.js src/lang/en.js src/vendor/OBJLoader.js src/vendor/OBMLoader.min.js src/js/globe.js -o dist/globe-en.js -c -m
scripts.build-fr: uglifyjs src/vendor/two.js src/vendor/three.js src/lang/fr.js src/vendor/OBJLoader.js src/vendor/OBMLoader.min.js src/js/globe.js -o dist/globe-fr.js -c -m
